pr_title: [risk=no][RW-4402] remove references to free tier time limits

timeline.message: remove references to free tier time limits

timeline.bodyText: Free tier alerting for cost has (or had?) a dependency on registration time which is no longer appropriate.  Removing this block would be a good test to see if we still have that.  IIRC there are other similar blocks in this file, which we should also remove.
timeline.author: jmthibault79

replies.bodyText: We do also use it to make sure we don't cost-check every single user, only users that are already registered.
replies.author: als364
